results.title: The Staunch tin soldier
results.brief_description: A puppet film for children based on the fairy tale by Hans Christian Anderson. Tin soldiers are cast and appear among the other toys on the birthday table. At night the toys come to life and the staunch tin soldier who has only one leg, falls in love with the little dancer.

results.title: The State public service
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Every career in the world of business and commerce is also present in the Public service and in some cases this field of employment offers better opportunities. A brief outline of the responsibilities undertaken by the Public Service lead to a glimpse of some of the careers which are involved. The various opportunities for training including University scholarships, are also included.

results.title: The Star maker = L'Uomo Delle Stelle
results.creator_credit: Vittorio Cecchi Gori, Checci Gori Group, Summit Entertainment and Giuseppe Tornatore
results.brief_description: From Guiseppe Tornatore, director of “Cinema Paradiso”, this is a story drenched in the filmmaker’s love for cinema. Set in Sicily in the early 1950s, it is the story of Joe Morelli (Sergio Castellitto), a con man who travels by truck from village to village posing as a film company representative. For a fee, he offers his victims screen tests, using passages from a script of “0

results.title: The Star child
results.creator_credit: Billy Budd Films, Sal Campo, Tony Chaskelson and Ted Berenson
results.brief_description: Two woodcutters, Gustave and Sven, witness a shooting star one cold evening and go searching for the gold they believe is at the end of it. Instead, the delivery is a little baby whom they take home, call Pero (love), and are convinced will grow up to be a great leader. On maturation he grows into a bully of a child who is unconvinced that the beggar woman who turns up in the village can be the mother of such a beautiful child as him. Thus begins a journey for the source of true beauty and a task that will test his level of compassion. Adapted from a short story by Oscar Wilde and animated by Lindsay Van Blerk, Min Che Lin, Brett Schuman and Ted Berenson. Voices: Keith Grenville, Joe Wishnia, Liz Williams, Linda Delport.

results.title: The Star = Zvezda
results.creator_credit: Karen Shakhnazarov, Nikolai Lebedev and Mosfilm
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Films of the great victory 1941-1945”.
Based on the book by Emmanuil Kazakevich, this film focuses on a group of Russian scouts in WW2, aiming to penetrate Nazi communications and thwart a major attack. Echoing the themes of Steven Spielberg’s “Saving Private Ryan” (2000), director Nikolai Lebedev presents war as chaotic, taxing and disorienting. At times quite claustrophobic, the film works best when presenting the dangerously fraught reconnaissance missions undertaken by the unit.

results.title: The Star
results.creator_credit: Danielle Gardner, Lawrence Pitkethly, BBC, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and New York Center for Visual History
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “American cinema”.
Greta Garbo, Cary Grant, Dustin Hoffman - these amongst many others are names synonymous with Hollywood. Early on, Hollywood saw that recognisable talent could minimise the financial risks of film production. Critics, film scholars and studio publicists view the stars from many angles, as marketing tools, cultural icons and products of the industry. Joan Crawford is used as a case study.

results.title: The Stamp Collector
results.brief_description: This compilation program includes two films on stamps in the Australian and Pacific regions. “Pictures that Post” looks at the objects and artworks which have made their way onto our postage stamps. “A Fragile Piece of History” documents the final re-enactment of the tin can mail delivery in the Tongan islands.

results.title: The Stage to three
results.creator_credit: Julian Biggs and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Comparisons”.
An introduction to three entertainers of outstanding talent: Katina Paxinou, an actress from Greece, Chatuporn Ratanavarah, demon dancer of Thailand, and Bruno Gerussi, a Canadian actor.
